education.degree: Certificate in Full Stack Web Development
education.description: A 24-week intensive program focused on gaining technical programming skills in HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Bootstrap, Firebase, Node Js, MySQL, MongoDB, Express, Handelbars.js & ReactJS.

work.title: Implementation Specialist/Project Manager
work.description: Built strong, lasting relationships and strategic partnerships through exceptional client service; served as primary point of contact for client communications

work.title: Software Support Specialist
work.description: Assisted customers on various software related issues including several versions of Windows Operating Systems.

work.title: IT Infrastructure Administrator/Software Support Tier 1

projects.title: The Right Note
projects.category: Interactive site designed for users to discover more about their favorite artists and the lyrics from that artist.

projects.title: Brewtime App
projects.category: This full stack application explores making API calls using the Google places/maps API, and geolocation API once a user logs into the website. The user must though allow for location services and then they are provided the closest coffee shops in their location.

projects.title: Google Book Tracker
projects.category: React-based Google Books Search app. (html, css, nodejs, expressjs, react, API)

projects.title: Burger App
projects.category: In this app, the user will have the opportunity create a unique burger, eat the burger and then delete the burger from the webpage. The tech used in this app: MySQL, Node.js, Express, and handlebars.
